Method Detail

getHypertextPane

public XUIHypertextPane getHypertextPane()
Returns the XUIHypertextPane.

init

public void init(XUI document)
The method required to be there for the binding to work.

listAction

public void listAction(XUIComponent component,
                       byte type,
                       int index)
/** This method is called whenever a component (specifically a window type component). This happens when a window has been closed.

Parameters:
component - the component that generated the event.
index - the index of the item that was selected/edited/deleted. If deleted, it is the previous index since that item no longer exists. If the index is -1, then no item is selected and/or no item available in the list (0 length list).

windowAction

public void windowAction(XUIComponent component)
This method is called whenever a XUIWindow or XUICustomDialog are closed. This happens when a window has been closed. We want to give the user in our application the opportunity to say no to exiting the application.

Parameters:
component - the component that generated the event.

textAction

public void textAction(XUIComponent component)
This method is called whenever a component has text entered into it. This can be as simple as a XUITextArea which generates this event every time a character is typed inside of the component. It can also be when a XUIPasswordField or XUITextField have the enter key pressed while the cursor is inside of this component. Finally, it can be when the XUIHypertextPane has text in the form of a URL used to direct the pane to a Web site based on that URL.

Parameters:
component - the component that generated the event.

action

public void action(XUIComponent component)
This method is called whenever a component has been selected/chosen. In our application specific context, we are looking for buttons, menu items and even a file dialog.

Parameters:
component - the component that generated the event.
